feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
